jobDescription: The Company: JUULs mission is to improve the lives of the Worlds one billion adult smokers by driving innovation to eliminate cigarettes. JUUL is the number one US-based independent e-cigarette, selling over four million JUUL pods per month. Headquartered in San Francisco and backed by leading technology investors including Tiger Global, Fidelity Investments and Tao Invest LLC, JUUL Labs is disrupting one of the Worlds largest and oldest industries.  Were an exceptional team with backgrounds in technology, healthcare, and biotech, and were growing rapidly to deliver on our mission. Were actively looking to hire the Worlds best scientists, engineers, designers, product managers, supply chain experts, customer service and business professionals. Role and Responsibilities: Reporting to the Director of Facilities the Facilities Coordinator will be responsible for the daily operational needs of multiple facilities at Pier 70 with the ability to prioritize and problem solve in a fast-paced environment. We are looking for a person who can multitask, build vendor relationships, support employee needs, and address building maintenance issues all while providing service with a smile. The key to success in this role will be a positive attitude, and a willingness to help resolve any facility issues that might arise.  This position will be based out of the JUUL headquarters located in the Dog Patch area of San Francisco and will be an hourly position with overtime eligibility.
